Name: Rajni
Title: New Make over of Tand Bund
Review: Tand bund is looking beautiful after the new modification. It has become a nice place to spend time. The street lights are looking nice and the view has become more beautiful.

Name: Xavier D
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Nice place to walk in the city across the Hussain Sagar Lake, nice during early mornings and evenings.

Name: Asha K
Title: Nostalgic !
Review: I lived in Hyderabad as a child and this was a trip along memory lane 50 years later with my husband.

Name: Abhay Mehta
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: The Hussain Sagar lake is the lovely place to visit and spend your time especially in the evening. You can also enjoy the history through different statues of great personalities placed all over.

Name: Dharmendra Singh
Title: Amazing hospitality
Review: Amazing hospitality, thanks to sajid for making it once again lovely stay, Ramkrishna Reddy charming and smiling as always and forthcoming, Front desk prakash, Preeti, handsome man from northeast forgetting his name, 2√ó univers ( room service) And many moreThanks a lotSee you soonGod bless

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Road with scenic views
Review: We had traveled by car along this road many times during our holiday in Hyderabad. This road is along the beautiful Hussain Sagar Lake and we got a great views of the lake and the giant Buddha statue in the middle of the lake while traveling by car on this road.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good for evening
Review: This is a good place to visit during the evening. Do visit the place when the weather is pleasant in Hyderabad. Good for driving as well.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Nice for early morning stroll
Review: Hussain Sagar lake is highly polluted and the lake stinks at several places. But early morning stroll is a pleasing experience. The Lumbini Park is located here from where you can take mechanized boat to the Buddha statue. There are also many good eating options including street food.

Name: Galabackhome
Title: Wow
Review: The lake doesn't smell great and don't try to cross. We were helped across the road by a little old lady!Hyderabad is not designed for wandering around on foot.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Tank Bund is a nice area to roam around with friends on a bike and chill. There are multiple street food outlets in this area.

Name: Rukitha sree
Title: Heart of Hyderabad
Review: Tank bund is water storage tank but very huge and deep.The famous aspect of Tankbund is The Buddha statue which was set in the mid of the tank.Near Tankbund you will find N.T.R garden, lumbini park.Eat street, Necklace road,love Hyderabad boarding, Indian National flag

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Nice Place
Review: Tank bund is meant for the statues and It is filled with Greenery and the best time to visit is night.

Name: moogul818
Title: Good place for an evening stroll
Review: Tank Bund makes for an interesting place to visit in Hyderabad. It connects the two twin cities; Hyderabad and Secunderabad. It also dams the Hussain Sagar Lake, which has the famous monolith of Gautam Buddha in the middle. The place is popular for 33 bronze statues of famous people of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana in the area around.   The wonderful view of Hussain Sagar Lake from Tank Bund attracts many visitors, especially in the evenings. There are several quite spots along the Tank bund where you can spend a while just enjoying the breeze and the view.

Name: Rock
Title: It is one of the nice place
Review: Tank bund is located in Hyderabad.I have visited this thrice.This is one of the most beautiful place to visit during evening time to enjoy boating and also you can visit place near to this.

Name: Sudheer P
Title: tank bund
Review: its a beautiful lake road with art and sculptures of great leaders. nice place to relax any time of the day

Name: KRAMA200
Title: A Nice Place to stroll
Review: Tank Bund is the main Artery connecting Hyderabad and Secunderabad. The Place has been developed as a Tourist Spot with Statues of Famous Personalities of Andhra. Nice to stroll in the morning or evening. You can canoe or do boating also if you desire.The Time you spend depends on Time available with you

Name: ravi g
Title: Nice for a leisurely walk and some water sports
Review: Nice place for a leisurely evening walk. There are food joints and parks around, so its a good outing option. For those who love some adventure then there are water sports activities also. Do take a boat ride to Buddha Statue located in the middle of the lake.

Name: ANU
Title: NICE
Review: There it's nice to spend in the evening...i went with my friends and had a good memory,anybody can visit...

Name: kaliprasadm2016
Title: too busy for a walk
Review: Morning walk on the tank bund is a good thing.It stinks but. Dont sit on the benches . they are used by people to sleep on and not hygienic

Title: Happy visit to Tank Bund, Hyderabad.

Title: Ganesh visarjanam

JAI BOLO GANESH MAHARAJ KI JAI

Title: visit must
Review: tank bund area is a very nice place bcoz you may see here all great people statues along with his every details. childrens will learn alot of abouth the all leaders and great personalities.

Name: ChennaiShaji
Title: The tank bund road has an excellent view of the lake and the city around

Name: jainms
Title: Best view

Name: Gaurav G
Title: Stinky and smelly
Review: Although the view looks great from a distance, the reality is very harsh when you see the lake and smell the surrounding air. It stinks horribly and it is a suicide point so you never know how many people jumped from the railing you are holding. it needs a lot of maintenance and a tight police watch 24x7.

Name: Vanitha Reddy
Title: ‚úåÔ∏è
Review: Loved this place visited early mornings. Enjoyed a lot with photo shoots and nature.i visit regularly.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: must see
Review: This is the place to go to enjoy the necklace road and it has good name and hussain sagar is also nearby.Has lot of things nearby to look for

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: Tank Bund is a beautiful place to relax and feel peace
Review: Tank Bund is one of the free hangout place that you can spend with your loved ones and family for free of cost. I mean there is no entry fee. In the early morning you won't find much traffic and you can see great people's statues that inspire you alot. You will also find many people walking, jogging, doing their exercises and simply meditating in the Musi river banks. It's a quite place in the morning during the sunrise üåÖ. You can also enjoy the evening sun set here. Watching great Buddha statue. Love this place alot. You will also find many people feeding peogeons with grains. That was really interesting. I it would be nice if Telangana Govt takes action to purify this water. So the that the people can also enjoy the fresh air.

Name: rohit706
Title: good place for evenings
Review: Its nice place to spend evenings with family with lot of crowd. lake is clean but still looks interesting

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Tank Bund Road
Review: The Tank Bund Road runs along the main lake in Hyderabad and is a very popular place for locals to hang about. The sides of the road have been developed and beautified to make good seating arrangements with statues of famous personalities and a few eateries. Overall a nice place to spend some time in the evenings.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Nice
Review: It is a nice place near the Necklace road. I visited this place for an evening stroll. Good eateries are there near this place.

Name: idea614354
Title: Tank bund road
Review: Tank bund raod in hyderabad we can a lot of great mans like freedom fighters, writeres, national leaders and many more.

Name: Ashish Reddy
Title: Peace ‚úåÔ∏è
Review: One can enjoy roaming around the city and we can capture the beauty of nature and ourselves. Full to time pass loved it‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: rahman s
Title: Nice place for evenings
Review: Been here with family, nice place to sit in the evening time. Have boating facility here, water have bad smell

Name: siv2015
Title: Loved it!
Review: This was an amazing place - we did the speed boat ride too. If its not in the hot summer months I would recommend this place for couples, families or solo travelers.

Name: saivarma
Title: Superb
Review: Beautiful place to spend the time with friends.And one of the greatest one in Telangana (Hyderabad).You can easily found this one from very far. Easy to found the location through the bike also.Boating facilities are available. Buddha statue looks too good.If someone is feeling alone, if they goes to this place they will feel better.Best suitable word for this place Is, place of peace.

Name: Noor Ali Abbas
Title: Statues Road
Review: Tank Bund Road is a part of Necklace Road which runs along the eastern side of the heart shaped Hussain Sagar Lake. The road looks beautiful with a long stretch of lush green lawns and trees. There are more statues of famous personalities along the road. Among those statues, Swami Vivekananda's is a notable one. Major parks along the Tank Bund Road are Lumbini Park and Indira Park. Most of the government and private banks are on this road. It is one of the commercial roads which connects Hyderabad and Secunderabad. Sailing Club, Snow World and Youth Hostel are also here. View of Buddha Statue looks awesome from this road. This road has the Hussain Sagar boating point of the lake which is inside Lumbini Park.

Name: mahareddy v
Title: This is one of the beautiful place in Hyderabad.
Review: Hussain sagar is now a tank bond this new name Beautiful place to spend the time with friends.And one of the greatest one in Telangana (Hyderabad).You can easily found this one from very far. Easy to found the location through the bike also.üëç

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Tank Bund Road
Review: It connects the twin cities i.e.Hyderabad and Secunderabad with Great views and statues of saints, Political Leaders and Cine Artists and Freedom fighters of india

Name: Nisshant
Title: Important milestone
Review: I get to know this since my hotel was on this road only. On one side you have hussain sagar lake and on the other you have a joggers park.Good for morning & evening strolls.

Name: ROBERTS ROSHAN M
Title: Average sight seeing
Review: I used to travel on Tank Bund earlier. But now the charm of Tank Bund is decreasing. It has been changed few times.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Must visit place in hyderabad
Review: Every tourist person will visit this place when coming to hyderabad and will surely feel the greatness of it.

Name: 1Jayanthi
Title: Connect of twin cities
Review: This road connects the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secundrabad. Used as a picnic place in the evenings. There are many many statues of mostly Telugu leaders/artists/freedom fighters etc.

Name: sravan s
Title: picnic place
Review: Hussain Sagar was built across a tributary of the river Musi river in 1563 by Ibrahim Quli Qutub Shah. The lake was named after Hussain Shah Wali, who helped to design it.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: nice place to hangout and stretch your legs
Review: nice and calming place to walk in the evening and keep out place in the afternoon unless you want to feel the sun at its fullest, harder to find a cover in the afternoon. overall enjoyed the walk and the company of my friends

Name: muthukrish2000
Title: Hyd - Sec
Review: This is the place connecting Hyderabad and secunderabad. Nice spot. We visited here evening for local shopping. Nice hangout place.

Name: rastha2001
Title: Iconic promenade connecting the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad
Review: The tank bund in the heart of the city connecting the twin cities is s great place for an evening stroll or just riding past. But the water of the Hussain Sagar lake can at times give out such a stench that it's unbearable to be anywhere around that area. The Buddha statue and boating from Lumbini park and activities there are added attractions. Must visit for any visitor to the city

Name: Sai B
Title: Heart of Hyderabad
Review: The view is great as it covers both the twin cities. It is also a good place to hang out all day as it has restaurants, parks, malls and multiplexes.

Name: rajendra p
Title: Don't forget to take selfie
Review: We are enjoyed a lot on weekend. But we forgot to take selfie at I love Hyderabad symbol. Had a great time with lots of fun

Name: Santosh1959
Title: nice place for an early morning walk or jog
Review: Ideal to finish your jogging and walking in the morning before the traffic picks up. nice greenery and good view of the lake. Difficult to cross the road after the traffic increases

Name: Debasis
Title: Average place
Review: if you hear TANK BUND, you think its great place, but instead its a average place in Hyderabad. One side water storage, other side road, foot path, parks etc. nothing special about this place.

Name: parusharouthud
Title: Tank bund is a bund arround the tank Hussain sagar in Hyderabad
Review: The Tank bund is a bund arround Hussainsagar which is having a unique lord Buddha statue. There are number of memorable people, who were great stalwarts .

Name: suresh n
Title: Beautiful  place and historical place
Review: Connecting Hyderabad and Secunderabad, Tank Bund is a popular hangout of the city. Promising its visitors with a breath taking view of the lake and its monolith of Bhudda in the center, it dams the Hussain Sagar Lake.This area showcases not just one or two but 33 bronze statues of various popular figures of the state such as of Sri Krishna Devaraya, Nannaya, Tikkana, Erra Pragada and many more.To its south it has Secretariat buildings, the NTR memorial, the Lumbini Park, and the Hyderabad boat club while to its north it has the Sanjeeviah Park, Hazrat Saidani Ma Saheba tomb, and the Secunderabad Sailing Club. Its prime location makes it even more attractive.

Name: Trending T
Title: One of the best place in hyderabad
Review: Thi place has been taken care by telangana government. KCR has made it to keep the longest indian flag hoisted everytime here.Must visit place.

Name: Brad P
Title: Neat place
Review: We had a great walk along this scenic area with statues of the famous writers, etc from Hyderabad on one side and the lake on the other. Crossing the street was quite an adventure so plan ahead

Name: Rajesh_in
Title: Nice place by the Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: Tank Bund is a nice ,busy place by Hussain Sagar Lake and had lot of food joints, parks, sitting area . You get nice view of the lake & Buddha Statue. it's one of the most frequented places by the locals and visitors alike.

Name: bh s
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Tank Bund which separates Hyderabad and Secunderabad,  statues were erected by late C.M of Andhra Pradesh N.T.Rama Rao.

Name: Devaa
Title: Only water body in heart of the city!!!
Review: Its always great to hang at this place dotted with all the attraction. Garden ,food court,Imax,rides and of course nice walking space.Even though too much traffic movement is here still this place always gets crowd.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Great Place to Hangout around the Hussain Sagar lake
Review: I crossed this place many times while commuting after I shifted from Kolkata to Hyderabad and always wondered about all the statues that are there. So one fine day in February 2018 me and my friend after watching a movie at Prasads decided to explore this place.We took a cab and reached here and walked along the Hussain Sagar lake reading about the eminent personalities from erstwhile Andhra Pradesh state.They were installed during NTR's reign while Andhra and Telengana states were together. We could not see all the statues but they were interesting as they contained not only great rulers but also poets, social reformers and rebels like Alluri Sitharama Raju.After 20 minutes walk we decided to sit and there are places where people are hanging out. You can also see the Buddha statue and the giant Indian flag from this place. There are many vendors selling snacks and ice creams.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Marine drive of hyderabad
Review: Though it is not on the same lines of marine drive in Mumbai.But reasonably a good place to visit in the evenings.

Name: SomnathKhaskel
Title: Lake view and walk ‚Ä¶.
Review: If you are able to ignore the foul smell of the water then it‚Äôs a place to enjoy the walk and the view of lake along with the statue of Buddha.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Nothing special
Review: Tank Bund is not a special tourist spot. It will come across your commute and you can just see the area around from your car.

Name: Nirban P
Title: I Love Hyderabad
Review: And Tank Bund is one of the place in Hyderabad which i can visit anytime of the day, any day of the year! Just a short-drive around the Tank Bund road all the way through the Necklace Road will refresh you. BTW did you know that Necklace Road has the Only Mounted Police Battalion (and the PS)  there!!

Name: Daniel T
Title: Scenic place in the heart of the city
Review: Right in the middle of Hyderabad & Secunderabad lies this big water body, surrounded by a walk-through on both sides. Nice place for an evening walk or to spend time on weekends. Lots of activities happen around Tank Bund, be it Lumbini Park or Water front side.Be aware of notorious bike-riders, who can be mischievous on the Necklace road front.

Name: Lalitha G
Title: nice place to visit in weekends.
Review: its a very rush area in weekends. nice to visit this place with family. will also have benches to have relax and its good place to visit.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Best place to see the view of Hyderabad
Review: Best place to see the view of Hyderabad, It is filled with Greenery and the best time to visit is night.

Name: 24x7TravellingBoy
Title: Evening hangouts at Hyderbad
Review: A nice place to hang out near the Hussein Sagar lake. A beautiful view with a little bit of photographic background. It is also a good driving place. Snow world and Indira park are at this road.

Name: Prem Fourhearts
Title: Truly Iconic Place
Review: Always a good place to hangout for all age groups, Has the Statues of Greatest Telugu People who have contributed to this land and their history written over ! Has A Garden Around and A Buddha Statue in the Center. A Good place to Jog and Ride Bicycle in the Mornings.

Name: Amanda W
Title: The lake is so full of sewerage, that a walk around it is unpleasant.
Review: The lake is no longer the attractive thing it possibly once was. √çt's heavily poluted, smells, and is generally unpleasant.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Tak Bund Road
Review: The tank bund road is in east side of Hussain Sagar Lake. The stretch have viewing points and there are several statues of famous and historical person.

Name: mahmoodkanji
Title: Interesting place to visit
Review: Hyderabad is a city of its own culture style and religion.Its worth going to see the old Nizam Style of living

Name: Kalakar
Title: Hallmark of Hyderabad
Review: This is 1+ kilometer stretch of TankBund road on the Hussain Sagar, that houses the walkways, viewing points one one side and Stature of famous historic personalities on the other side. On the side of the road, there are little green spaces for kids to play. While road will have very busy traffic, but dotted with few eatery stalls/carts.  We could manage a very short time on this stretch owing to busy traffic & parking shortages. Good for a short pass-by trip...

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: One of the tourist spots of Hyderabad undoubtedly
Review: Want to hang around with your family or life partner or friends with a misty evening with a backdrop of big lake then tankbund is the place. Do visit.

Name: fivestarholidays
Title: Disappointing
Review: The water was smelly and overall the place did not have fresh clean feel that it used to. Definitely needs attention and beautifying

Name: nikhil0210
Title: Popular
Review: This is a popular place which is looked up as division between Hyderabad and Secunderabad. But now a days it smells a lot.

Name: Aartichand
Title: Nice drive
Review: The best way to enjoy Tank Bund is to take a drive along it late evening. The peak traffic has eased and the surrounding area is well lit up. One gets a good view of the Buddha Statue. Also along the road there are some food stalls.

Name: Trips_for_Life
Title: Leisure ride and some good wind
Review: Nice place to go with family and friends. Beautiful view of lake on one side and all chat walas, icecrem vendors on other side. Its a happening place at weekends.

Name: Kainath
Title: Lake View
Review: You dont find a sea in hyderabad but yes this lake view at tank bund, it's ideal for a summer evening... After a sunny hot summer day, head to this place for some cool breeze and pocket friendly snacks.

Name: naiduks24
Title: full of water with foul smell
Review: the water receives in this pond from different places in twin cities and stagnate there, resulting very bad and could smell, the present Government of Telangana  making  excellent efforts to avoid dirty inside the water and some other measures are also taking with the help of experts, but I am sure if  same yardstick applies then it will one day become a paradise.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Good place  to spend time
Review: This place is very good for spending evening with your family and kids.  Evenings are generally crowded. Parking is bit of problem.  Overall a nice place

Name: Durga S
Title: Tank bund
Review: Never miss sun rise and sunset of tank bund..where the water is simply floating with cool breeze and with beautiful view of Buddha statue.#heartofhyd #lovehyd #proudhydi

Name: WondererGuy
Title: Nice evening outing..
Review: If you want to have nice relaxed time with your family with good scenic view than this is a right place to be.

Name: Saikiran Rao
Title: Largest Monolith in the world
Review: Tank Bund road connects the two parts of the city Hyderabad and Secunderabad. It also dams one of the most popular sightseeing places of Hyderabad,¬†Hussain Sagar Lake, which has the famous monolith of¬†Gautam Buddha¬†in the middle. This statue is said to be one of the largest monolith in the world. Breathtaking view of Hussain Sagar Lake from Tank Bund is breathtaking which also attracts many to the place. It is spectacular especially in night, when the lights around the statue are switched on.The place is popular for 33 bronze statues of famous people of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana in the area around. Some of these sculpture are of Sri Krishnadevaraya, Nannaya, Tikkana, Yerrapragada,Annamayya, Alluri Seetharama Raju, Raghupathi Venkataratnam Naidu, Molla, Tripuraneni Ramaswamy Chowdary etc. These statues were created in the memory of a few prominent personalities of the state including many renowned poets from Telugu literature, great writers, rulers, social workers and freedom fighters.These sculptures immortalize the incomparable efforts of these personalities in the development of not only their specific field but of entire human kind. Tank Bund even now reminds us of their great achievements, while humbling us at the same time. These sculptures are on both the sides of Tank Bund.These statues were erected by the former chief minister N.T. Rama Rao during 1987-88. Earlier the tank bund road used to be quite narrow and was widened in 1946. Later the place was beautified with the addition of many captivating statues and lush green gardens.Since its beautification, Tank Bund has become a popular site not only among the residents of Hyderabad but also among the tourists. People visit this place for a relaxed outing. Whether you are visiting with your family and kids, with a group of friends or partner, you will find it suitable for all the purposes.Nearby parks are perfect for family get together with varied playing options for kids. Tank Bund offers a suitable relaxed venue for couples to spend some quiet time with each other by the side of lake, away from the concrete jungle. Apart from that it acts as a common point for many popular sightseeing places.Tank Bund enjoys a good location. On the southern side of Tank Bund there are Secretariat buildings, the¬†Lumbini Park, the NTR memorial, the Hyderabad boat club. While on its northern side, you have Hazrat Saidani Ma Saheba tomb, the¬†Sanjeevaiah Park¬†and the Secunderabad Sailing Club. Indira Gandhi Park is also located quite close to it. Secretariat and the state assembly are also located nearby. You can also plan a trip to¬†Birla Mandir Hyderabad¬†on the same day as your visit to Necklace Road.

Name: Karthik C
Title: Perfect place of Nature
Review: Tank bund is the place where the historic idols of Khairatabad & Balapur Ganesha's immense into water. Almost 30-40 thousands of Ganesha idols immense into water at the time of Ganesh Chaturthi. It is on the banks of Musi river which has the biggest Buddha idol(120ft) in Asia. It has boating and sailing club where everyone can enjoy the evenings.

Name: PRASAD C
Title: FOR A GANESH POOJA MAHOSTAV
Review: we are in hyderabad on ganesh pooja last day, we are enjoyed with dancings and fully sounds, all around full of croud and ganesh idols.  every where you can here only ganapatibappa moriyaaaaa..

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Explore at your own pace
Review: Located near Necklace road, this is a stretch of road which is quite pleasant to walk along . There are statues of historic people from Telgu society and several eating joints as well to keep the visitors hooked up. .

Name: travel w
Title: best place to ciy view
Review: right on hussain sagar lake, this one of the most famous attraction. You can take a walk around it, evening are pleasant to enjoy

Name: Ravikanthvadamala
Title: A Nice Walk along with telugu history.
Review: The status of the great telugu people from various people with a view of tankbund and Necklace road. You can have an good walk along with some street food and Icecreams.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Ganesh nimajanam
Review: Yesterday me and my friends was go to tankbund for Lord Ganesha nimajanam ,where I was seen lots of people gathering together and make some fun.

Name: KaranPais
Title: Scenic views
Review: It is place where families come to spend a relaxed evening on weekends and it can get pretty crowded. Traffic is a pain and so we took an Uber

Name: Im O
Title: Tank bund
Review: Tank bund is nice place to spent evening with family.place beautiful maintenaned well.but some crowded during weekend

Name: 357balajib
Title: My first shipping..
Review: Hyderabad s one of the most famous place is tank bund. Here we can see the statue of Buddha in centre of river. It's an excellent night view.here we can go near statue in ship.its really a great experience in Hyderabad.its an excellent place .Hope everyone should visit this place.

Name: Mohammed Sohail Ahmed
Title: Well maintained yet conjusted
Review: It's very tidy and well maintained place. The only issue is with the breadth of the road. Road widening is must for better movement of vehicles.

Name: Sameena K
Title: LET US TRY AND KEEP OUR HUSSAIN SAGAR (TANK BUND) CLEAN.
Review: Friends, Hussain Sagar (Tank Bund) could have been rated 5 by all of us had it been kept clean.Tank bund could have been a beautiful sightseeing venue,had it been kept clean and well maintained As a teenager l used to do kayaking and rowing in Tank bund waters.l do have a lot of attachment for this water body, hence l feel saddened to see its water turned  into marshy green in colour with garbage litter thrown in the waters and  on the pedestrian's pavement.The beautifully carved statue's of our leaders and scholar's on one side of the Tank Bund road makes it more beautiful.The Buddha statue right in the middle of the waters and the erected lndian flag's beauty, waving it's tri colours to us adds on to its beauty but for the litter which makes me feel sad and dejected.IF WE AS INDIANS ALONG WITH THE AUTHORITIES TRY AND KEEP THIS BEAUTIFUL PLACE CLEAN, THEN IT WILL TURN OUT TO BE THE BEST PLACE IN HYDERABAD FOR AN OUTING.POSTING A PICTURE OF THE GARBAGE DUMP  ON THE PAVEMENT MEANT FOR WALKING.THANK YOU!IF YOU AGREE WITH ME, PLEASE DO NOT FORGET TO GIVE A THUMBS UP.THIS WILL BE MY INCENTIVE FOR CONTRIBUTING MY TIME IN WRITING GENUINE AND HONEST REVIEWS.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Great wide road
Review: This is one of the best roads in Hyderabad. It is so goof that an F1 exhibition show was conducted on this road.

Name: Sampath Kumar S
Title: Twilight Place
Review: This is the place which is most happening and offers best scenic place in the city.. Parks, Lake View, Boat rides, Food streets what not it got all to keep you engaged and love the place

Name: Karthik T
Title: Best Time pass
Review: Tank bund is the one of the best timepass place with friends and went for the boat ride also towards Buddha's statue in the middle of tank bund

Name: BRKanth
Title: Place of Morning Walk
Review: This is the place for morning walkers who stay nearby areas. Not worth of traveling especially for walk from far off places.
